id: Tears and tributes as Melbourne's Pellegrini's cafe reopens
paragraph:
Posted 
    
      November 13, 2018 10:32:53
    
Pellegrini's Espresso Bar opened its doors at 8:00am.
      Source: ABC News
      |
      Duration: 42sec
Topics:
terrorism,


	
	melbourne-3000
